resources.string: Is Android SKD version support Fingerprint?
Is any Fingerprint available in your device?
Sorry\nYou can not Authenticate by Fingerprint.\nAll checks should be OK.
Check if the Android version in this device is greater than Marshmallow, since Fingerprint Authentication is only supported from Android 6.0 / API-23
Check if this Android device has Fingerprint sensors or not
Check if the permission has been added to the application, This permission will be granted as soon as the user installs the application on their device
Check if there are any registered Fingerprints on this device or not
